Text: //カットシーン再生
His attacks are clearly working!

Master Shadow! None of us stood a chance against the
dragon, and yet...
He's got it in the palm of his hand. Incredible!

Boss man's the strongest! That's why Boss man's the
leader of our pack!

When did you last experience the arrogance and hubris
of the mighty?

In any case, it seems I will be the first to shatter
your unchallenged indulgences head-on.
Heh heh heh... You think...you can slay me?!
This fear...it brings me immense pleasure!

My ancient pact was once discarded...but the world
has returned it to me!

Yes, perhaps you may be the one... However! You make
far too many unnecessary moves!
Master Shadow!
...No, those moves weren't unnecessary!
Huh?!
Unnecessary moves, huh?

If only your power-obsessed, arrogant mind did not
cloud your judgment...

...you would not have betrayed yourself to an unknown
foe.
My blade shall always take the honorable path!

Im-Impossible...! Your moves were no arrogant display
of strength—you calculated them!
I may be strong, but more than that...
I am strength incarnate!
(A bit too simple of a closer, maybe?)

(Might've been my straightforward handling of the
dragon's fatal error caused by typical impatience,
which resulted in it overreacting to a simple space
adjustment on my part.)

(Oh well, guess there'll always be plenty of other
opportunities.)
Yes!
...Hold on, wait!
Grarrr...rarrr...rarrr!
It's still alive?!

Something a mere mortal like you...is unlikely to
comprehend!

But you've got blood gushing outta you! Do dragons
not die?!
(Really good question.)

(Doesn't seem like an undead, and I doubt it's a
number of "lives" left thing, a "defeat using a
special method" deal, or even one of those
glitched unbeatable bosses.)

This world is cursed...so that no dragon...is
allowed...a conventional death!

Hence...true victory over a dragon...is gained by
having the power...to take its life!

My ancient pact...is to obey those who possess that
power...on the condition that one day I will be given
death.
I see... Interesting magic.

(Is this...some sort of marking? Just wish it hadn't
breathed on me directly. I mean, it probably hasn't
brushed its teeth, right? Anyway...)

My power will be with you always! You, who shall one
day end my life...what is it you desire?

...I couldn't kill you off, which means I still have
more training to do.
H-Hmph... It's not that simple!

(Well, that's what it comes down to. Besides, my
physique is still lacking in a lot of ways. Should
resolve itself with time, but it's a little annoying.)

(Oh, looks like I'm outta time. I'll miss my sister's
curfew if I don't dash home.)

I have personal matters to deal with. I'll leave the
rest to you, Alpha.
Understood!

Hah hah hah... This Shadow—he's quite the
extraordinary individual!

So you are the allies who follow him. Why do you
travel through these woods to the ancient city of
Alexandria?

We seek a new land worthy of Shadow and the Shadow
Garden he leads.

Shadow and the rest of us have work to do. We'll need
a place to lay low and build our strength for this.
A new land... I see!

Increasing your strength will help him come closer to
uncovering the truth of this world.

Very well. Let the ancient city of Alexandria,
combined with my power, belong to Shadow
and the Shadow Garden!
Ohh!

Henceforth, this ancient city will be your stronghold.
My mist will be the veil that hides you from the world!
The fog is clearing!
So...this is the ancient city of Alexandria!
Lady Alpha...
Gamma, return immediately, and inform Eta and Lambda.
Our base relocation begins now!
Here to report—eeek!

(As usual, she manages to trip on nothing. Is there
any way to utilize this talent of hers?)
S-So sorry... I'm here to report.
Your nose is bleeding.
Oh! Excuse me—we've commandeered a new base.

The relocation of personnel and supplies is nearly
complete, and the new base should be fully
operational by the start of next week.

(She's got mad administrative talent. Bet she's the
type who'd be amazing at simulation games.)

Keep it up, Gamma. Always strive to improve yourself,
and don't get complacent at the new base. Upholding
that mindset will strengthen your foundation.

(If only she could channel her talents to take on a
little more action. Well, I guess people like Alpha
and Zeta, who can handle everything, are the rare
ones.)

Understood, Master Shadow! By the way, regarding our
new base—
Hey, Cid! Everything okay?!
Aaah!!!
Wow, she didn't trip this time.
Cid?! I just heard a loud crash—

Hm? I'm fine. Not like I tripped and fell or
anything.

Really? Well, as long as you're okay. Jeez...you
scared me.

Anyway, I just got back, so hurry on out here—don't
stay cooped up in your room!
Got it. I'll be right there.

What a day—secretly spying on the girls' merry picnic,
fighting an enemy of enormous strength, and taking
care of everything here at home...
It's not easy being a shadowbroker.

Looks like Gamma's gone. Wonder where this new base
she mentioned is, anyway.

Well, knowing Gamma, I guess she just wanted to chat
about all the fine details.
